relayERC20(address,address,address,uint2.details: Tokens are minted on the destination chain.

params._from: Address of the msg.sender of sendERC20 on the source chain.

sendERC20(address,address,uint256,uint25.details: Tokens are burned on the source chain.

params._chainId: Chain ID of the destination chain.

relayERC20(address,address,address,uint2.notice: Relays tokens received from another chain.

sendERC20(address,address,uint256,uint25.notice: Sends tokens to a target address on another chain.
